resources.string: International dialing code of the country you are currently in: %s
Replace + followed by the current country code with the local call prefix
Replace + for international calls with the international call prefix

IntlPrefix by Gaston DASSIEU-BLANCHET.

This app adds international and local prefixes to outgoing phone calls.

Kindly report any bugs to gdassieu@gmail.com.

os.Build.PRODUCT=%1$s
os.Build.VERSION.SDK_INT=%2$d
